mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This letter though dictated and signed by Lee, was penned by one of his staff members. Lee reports to Jefferson Davis on the Second Battle of Manassas or Second Bull Run.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Davis, Jefferson, 1808-1889
